Package bg.sofia.uni.fmi.mjt.splitwise.user

Interface User

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardUser
public interface User

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFriendToFriendsList​(java.lang.String username)
    Allows the current user to add another user to his friends list.
    double amountOweFriend​(java.lang.String username)
    Allows the current user to get the amount he owes to the user with username username

    Allows the current user to create a group named groupName with the users with usernames usernames.

    Allows the current user to split a bill with the user with username username
    void splitByGroup​(java.lang.String groupName, double amount, java.lang.String paymentReason)
    Allows the current user to split a bill among the him and the other participant in the group named groupName, if the group exists.

  • Method Details

    • of

      static User of​(java.lang.String line)
      Allows 1 line of our database to be parsed to a User object.

    • addFriendToFriendsList

      void addFriendToFriendsList​(java.lang.String username) throws UsernameAlreadyExistsException
      Allows the current user to add another user to his friends list.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user that should be added to the friends list
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if username is a null, empty string or blank space
      UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the user with username username is already added to the friends list

    • split

      void split​(double amount, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String paymentReason) throws UserNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to split a bill with the user with username username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user which has not payed
      amount - the amount of the bill
      paymentReason - the reason for the payment
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if username is null, empty string or blank space
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username username is not found in our database

    • payed

      void payed​(java.lang.String username, double amount) throws UserNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to note that the user with username username has return him amount
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who has return the certain amount amount
      amount - the amount of the bill
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if username is null, empty string or blank space
      UserNotFoundException

    • createGroup

      void createGroup​(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String... usernames) throws UnableToCreateGroupException
      Allows the current user to create a group named groupName with the users with usernames usernames.
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group the current user wants to create
      usernames - the usernames of the other participants in the group named groupName
      Throws:
      UnableToCreateGroupException - if a problem occurred while creating the group

    • splitByGroup

      void splitByGroup​(java.lang.String groupName, double amount, java.lang.String paymentReason) throws GroupNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to split a bill among the him and the other participant in the group named groupName, if the group exists.
      Parameters:
      groupName - tha name of the group
      amount - the amount of the bill
      paymentReason - the reason of the payment
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if groupName or if paymentReason is null or an empty string.
      GroupNotFoundException - if the group named groupName does not exist in our database

    • getFriendsListToString

      java.lang.String getFriendsListToString()
      Returns:
      a string representation of all the users from the current user's friend list which owe him money

    • getGroup

      java.lang.String getGroup​(java.lang.String groupName) throws GroupNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to get a particular group named groupName
      Throws:
      GroupNotFoundException

    • payedFromGroupMember

      void payedFromGroupMember​(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String username, double amount) throws UserNotFoundException, GroupNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to note that a member in group groupName whose username is username has return amount
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group both the users participate in.
      amount - the amount the second user owes the first one
      username - the username of the user who owes money
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if groupName is null or empty string
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with username username is not found in our database.
      GroupNotFoundException - if the group named groupName is not found in our database.

    • getUsername

      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Returns:
      the username of the current user

    • getGroupMembersUsernames

      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getGroupMembersUsernames​(java.lang.String groupName) throws GroupNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      groupName - the name of the group we are searching for
      Returns:
      a set of the usernames of all participant in this particular group named groupName
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if groupName is null, empty string or blank space
      GroupNotFoundException - if the group named groupName is not found in our database

    • isValidPassword

      boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password1)
      Returns:
      true if the value of password1 equals the current user's password value

    • getAllUnfinishedGroups

      java.lang.String getAllUnfinishedGroups()
      Returns:
      a string representation of all the groups of the current user, which have at least one participant who owes the current user money

    • getAllFriendIOweMoneyMessage

      java.lang.String getAllFriendIOweMoneyMessage()
      Returns:
      a string representation of all the users which the current user owes money to.

    • amountOweFriend

      double amountOweFriend​(java.lang.String username) throws UserNotFoundException
      Allows the current user to get the amount he owes to the user with username username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user which the current user owes money to
      Returns:
      the amount the current user owes the user with username username
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException

    • getGroupMemberOweAmount

      double getGroupMemberOweAmount​(java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String username) throws GroupNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Throws:
      GroupNotFoundException
      UserNotFoundException
